docs.text: Ciao, please have a seat I am Andrea, you can call me Andrea (or Clark) [or wathever you want]. I work as Data Scientist but I am a mathematician. I think data science is a bubble, what is metter is the math behind and the statistics and doing a job using your brain. I am big fan of the "make it simple" approach. My favorite model is the constant, not even the linear regression. Useful links My github page Linkedin
